As a contributor to this project you will be helping this vision of inspiring people to get out and enjoy nature, respect and preserve our nation's natural areas, and find the renewing qualities of capturing a moment with brush and paint in the heart of stunning natural scenery.  
My current instructional videos have been enjoyed thousands of times by viewers and continue to grow in popularity, thus spreading the inspiration and rejuvenating qualities of being surrounded by nature, and keeping the Plein Air Movement thriving and alive.
Join us in creating an inspirational and exciting gateway into the world of outdoor painting and exploration!


Other Ways You Can Help
We have one month to raise the funds, as we aim to shoot this in early summer.  If you feel inspired to share this with your friends who might like to support the arts, please do.
campaign_city: New York, New York, United States

story:
WHAT IS BROWN?

We live in a world where marginalized groups are finally getting their time in the sun. Society is changing, and with it our standards. Television is beginning to reflect real life.

BROWN is the latest installment of the coming-of-age ensemble comedy, the newest generation of Friends, if they were all sassy, emotionally damaged people of color who are more codependent on their iPhones than they are with each other.

The show follows Omar and Olive, two black siblings in constant competition with one another, and their friends:

  • Jack, a painfully shy Latinx nerd.
  • Beau, a Polynesian surfer/stoner and resident Adonis, and,
  • Daisy: no nonsense, ambiguously Asian, and killing everyone with kindness.

Together they tackle issues of race, identity and sexuality, all while trying to support each other and redefine what it means to really be a family.

WHY BROWN?

It seems like everywhere you look now, there’s a show about plucky minorities rearing its head. To some this is overkill. To us? It’s what we deserve. Reparations, if you will, for years of constant exposure to the nuclear family.

For many of the members of the crew, we yearned to see faces that looked like ours when we were growing up. The lack thereof can be supremely damaging to a young mind. BROWN has a way of celebrating the beauty and differences of disparate cultures without making it a huge deal. It’s just life. A little crazy, a little offbeat, and yeah: more than just black and white.

WHO'S ON DECK?

OLYVIA SCOTT is the creator of BROWN, as well as the director and writer of the pilot. She has been working on BROWN since her freshman year of college and is now entering her senior year (whew!).  Olyvia’s favorite character is Beau, but for inexplicable reasons is probably most like Olive.

DANIELLA FERNANDEZ is the director of photography. A talented, writer, photographer and painter (double whew), Daniella is a proud Gemini and identifies the most with Jack. Since graduating from SCAD in 2017 with a degree in Film & Television, Daniella has been instrumental in the development of BROWN and is eager to bring the characters to life onscreen!

DEONNA GIBBS, assistant director, Leo. DeOnna studies Dramatic Writing, Photography and Music Composition (triple whew) and is in her senior year as well. She identifies as the female version of Omar and, should the moment arise, is prepared to play him at the drop of a hat. She intends to pursue playwriting after all is said and done, but for now is content in the BROWN writer’s room.

CASSIDY HAYNES is producer and head gyal in charge. Her boundless energy and optimism is rivaled only by anime heroines, and we are forever grateful to be harnessing a human Energizer bunny on this project. Haynes is studying Dramatic Writing like DeOnna, is a proud Libra (as is Olyvia), and loves every character to death. (Olive is her favorite despite the fact that she refuses to choose.)

HOW YOU CAN HELP

BROWN is being funded independently. Like our charming band of characters, the creators of the show are broke twentysomethings that just need a little help from their friends.

The ultimate goal is $3,000. And that’s quite a bit on paper. But as this is a passion project years in the making, we want it done right. However, this is a flexible goal. We have already raised $1K with our first campaign and we know we can do it again, if not more.

$500 will get our foot in the door.
This will get us enough to film a quick proof of concept, one that we can feel good about showing. With $1K, all backers will receive their perks and we’ll be able to give you all a taste of the characters and the show as a whole.

$1,5000 will get us halfway there!
$2.5K can help us shoot and edit approximately half of the pilot.

$3,000? Say no more.
With our full budget, the creators of BROWN can produce a fully fleshed out pilot, one that we can send to festivals and present to production companies. Production will start in the fall and the final cut will be released in 2019.

WHERE IS MY MONEY GOING?

The money we raise will go 100% towards the execution of BROWN. But since we’re perfectionists, here’s a breakdown of costs:

  • Locations: It all starts somewhere!
  • Production Design: Costumes, make-up, props, and set dress are important elements in their own right. We want to make sure our cast and the locations look their best.
  • Equipment: Cameras, lighting, and sound are going to be imperative to making this pilot the best it can be.
  • Food, food, food: We’ve all got mouths to feed. And for our full days on set, we want to make sure that our cast and crew are happy and healthy.
  • Post and Promo: Even after the cameras stop rolling, we’ve got footage to edit and a film to promote! This will help us polish the final cut and send it on its way when we’re finished. (This also includes the perks we’ll be sending out *gasp* TO YOU!)
  • Accidentals, artistic promotion and miscellaneous needs.
  • Those Indiegogo fees!

HOW ELSE CAN I HELP?

Help spread the word about BROWN!

Follow our journey on Instagram, Facebook and Twitter.

Share the link to our crowdfunding page! Every penny counts.

story:
(Version française plus bas)

Welcome to the Web-Serie “The Mortals”! ⚔

First of all, let’s introduce ourselves: we are AC Powers, an emerging media team preparing the first season of a dramatic web-series set in a medieval-fantasy context. We are young, passionate and dynamic filmmakers who have been working in the arts for several years now, and we are now embarking on our most daring venture yet! 

 

Synopsis ☠

While we want to keep it as surprising as possible, story-wise, here’s a brief idea of what will the series look like :

As clashes between humans and orcs escalate, Clara joins the Alliance forces to help her nation fend off the tribal forces that are advancing further into their territory. Faced with a reality where magic, orcs, and paladins are real, her training as a militiaman will be put to the test as she discovers a war where good and evil no longer seem so distinct. 

 

We have already produced a pilot to give you an idea of the seriousness of the project: cinematographic quality, beautiful costumes and makeup, original soundtrack, exciting choreography ... While keeping the main plot of the scenario yours to discover once the project is released ;) 

 

Ambitions

Compared to what we see being produced on the Quebec film scene in normal times, this is a rather singular project! Initially, we are planning a free online distribution, while aiming to send the project to festivals (like Fantasia) and to different distribution companies, to potentially succeed in unlocking a budget for a second season. One could say that season 1 itself is like a pilot project!

 

What you contribute...

That's where you come in! A project like this requires a lot of resources and we need help. Fortunately, our dedicated volunteer team believes in the project and is willing to invest in it despite the lack of budget. Also, we are fortunate to already be working with some great partners and have been able to accumulate some resources over time. However, some expenses cannot be avoided...

 

Any money you give us will go directly into the expenses of the production: feeding the crew, making the costumes, providing the make-up, covering the transportation costs... The more you contribute, the more we will be able to offer you a truly EPIC series!

 

 

 

... What you collect!

The first big reward, for you as well as for us, will be that we will all have in our hands a complete first season of the web-series to entertain us all and make us dream! But of course, this one goes without saying ;)

Then, depending on the nature or weight of your contribution, interesting rewards are planned! 

These can be exclusive content, early access to the season... 

Personalized thanks, a place in the credits...

Exclusive merchandise, even unique items used during the shooting!

We are still talking with our partners to see what other unique options we can offer you! Many more options are on their way! 

 

The challenges

It goes without saying that a project like this has its share of challenges, but we are resourceful! We intend to complete the project no matter what, but the unexpected and lack of resources are always obvious obstacles in projects like this. 

Things may change or deadlines may be pushed back, but in any case, we will work hard to adapt. Our experience on similar projects over the years equips us to handle such obstacles.

And... The higher the waves, the better the story to tell when we get to the harbor!

In the end, the more support we receive from you, the more these unforeseen events can be avoided and the more the project will keep its original nature!

 

Partners

By the way, as we were talking about challenges, we are not alone in this adventure! Several partners, each as devoted as the other, have already shown their interest and are ready to help in their own way to make this dream a reality! In particular...

 

“Calimacil” who equip us with spectacular custom weapons!

"Les Terres de Bélénos", who are lending a hand by allowing the series to be created on their domain!

“Les Forges de Chek”, who provide amazing costumes, armors, and orc scenery!

“Les ateliers du Lys d’Or”, who devote their talents to outfitting our soldiers with handmade costumes!

“Les Forges d'Arcalion”, who is busy arming our soldiers for the battlefield!

Farya Faraji, who composes a completely original musical score and gives the project a unique melodic soul.

Adrenaline Stunts, who lends its expertise to ensure breathtaking battles!

“Atelier du Loisir” who helped the project to be born by allowing the pilot episode to be held on their land! 

 

So, why not join us as our partners have already done? :D

 

SHARE!

Any type of help you are willing to provide will be appreciated! We realize that some may not be able to contribute monetarily, but for those who are able to do so, to whatever degree, we say a HUGE THANK YOU!!! 

Otherwise, for those of you who are looking for ways to help in other ways, already by sharing our campaign, you will be helping tons to make a great difference and really help this project come to life!

 

Stay tuned! We will give you more news soon ;) 

 

THANK YOU!

 

 

Bienvenue à la web-série “Les mortels”! ⚔

Tout d’abord, permettez-moi de nous présenter : nous sommes AC Powers, une équipe émergente qui prépare la première saison d’une web-série dramatique se situant dans un contexte médiéval-fantastique. Nous sommes de jeunes cinéastes passionnés et dynamiques qui œuvrent dans le domaine artistique depuis plusieurs années déjà, et nous amorçons maintenants notre aventure la plus audacieuse à ce jour! 

 

Synopsis ☠

Bien qu’on souhaite garder la surprise le plus possible, côté histoire, la série aura l’air de quoi?Juste pour donner une idée, voici un court aperçu :

Alors que les affrontements se multiplient entre les humains et les orcs, Clara joint les forces de l’Alliance afin d’aider sa nation à repousser les forces tribales qui avancent de plus en plus sur leur territoire. Confrontée à une réalité où magie, orcs et paladins sont bien réels, son entraînement de milicienne sera mis à rude épreuve alors qu’elle découvrira une guerre où le bien et le mal ne semblent plus si distincts. 

 

Nous avons déjà produit un pilote visant à vous donner une idée du sérieux du projet : qualité cinématographique, beauté des costumes et maquillages, trame sonore originale, chorégraphies palpitantes … Tout en gardant l'intrigue principale du scénario à découvrir lors de la sortie du projet! ;) 

 

Ambitions

Si on compare à ce qu’on voit se faire produire sur la scène cinématographique québécoise en temps normal, il s’agit d’un projet assez singulier! Initialement, nous planifions une distribution gratuite en ligne, tout en visant d'envoyer le projet dans des festivals (comme Fantasia) et à différentes boîtes de production, pour potentiellement réussir à débloquer un budget pour une saison 2. On pourrait un peu dire que la saison 1 en soit est comme un projet pilote!

 

Ce que vous contribuez...

Voilà donc là où vous entrez en ligne de compte! Un projet de la sorte nécessite beaucoup de ressources et nous avons besoin d'aide. Heureusement, notre équipe bénévole dévouée croit au projet et est prête à s’investir malgré le manque de budget. Aussi, nous avons déjà la chance de travailler avec de superbes partenaires (que nous vous présenterons bientôt!) et d'avoir pu accumuler certaines ressources avec le temps. Toutefois, certaines dépenses ne peuvent être contournées...

Toute somme que vous nous accorderez ira donc directement dans les dépenses ensentielles à la production : nourrir l'équipe, confectionner les costumes, fournir les maquillages, couvrir les frais de transport... Plus vos contributions seront nombreuses, plus nous serons en mesure de vous offrir une série réellement ÉPIQUE!

 

... Ce que vous récoltez!

La première grosse récompense, autant pour vous que pour nous, sera que nous aurons tous entre nos mains une première saison complète de la web-série pour tous nous divertir et nous faire rêver! Mais naturellement, celle-là va de soit! ;)

Ensuite, selon la nature ou le poids de votre contribution, des récompenses intéressantes sont prévues! 

  1. Celles-ci peuvent être du contenu exclusif, un accès anticipé à la saison...
     
  2. Des remerciements personalisés, une place dans le générique...
     
  3. De la marchandise exclusive, jusqu'à même des items tout à fait uniques ayant servi lors du tournage!

Nous sommes d'ailleurs encore en train de parler avec nos partenaires, pour voir quelles autres options uniques nous pourrons vous offrir!! Beaucoup plus d'options restent à venir! 

 

Les défis

Il va sans dire qu'un projet comme celui-ci comporte son lot de défis, mais nous sommes débrouillards! Nous comptons bien réaliser le projet quoi qu'il arrive, mais les imprévus et le manque de ressources restent toujours des obstacles évidents lors de projets comme celui-ci. 

Il se peut que des éléments changent ou encore que des échéances se fassent repousser, mais dans tous les cas, nous travaillerons corps et âme pour nous adapter. Notre expérience sur des projets de même nature depuis des années nous équipe pour savoir affronter de tels obstacles.

Et puis, plus les vagues sont hautes, plus l'histoire est bonne à raconter une fois rendu au port!

Au final, plus votre support sera grand, plus ces imprévus pourront être évités et plus le projet conservera sa nature première!

 

Partenaires

D'ailleurs, comme nous parlions de défis, nous ne sommes pas seuls dans cette aventure! Plusieurs partenaires tous aussi dévoués les uns que les autres ont déjà montré leur intérêt, et sont prêt à mettre la main à la pâte à leur façon pour faire de ce rêve une réalité! Notamment…

Calimacil qui nous équipent d’armes personnalisées tout à fait spectaculaires!

Les Terres de Bélénos qui se prêtent au jeu en permettant à la série de voir le jour sur son domaine!

Les Forges de Chek, qui fournissent des costumes, armures, et décors orcs tout à fait stupéfiants!

Les ateliers du Lys d'or, qui dévouent leurs talents à équiper nos soldats avec des costumes faits à la main!

Les Forges d'Arcalion, qui s’affaire à armurer nos soldats pour le champ de bataille!.

Farya Faraji, qui compose une trame musicale complètement originale et assure au projet une âme mélodique unique.

Adrénaline Cascades qui prête son expertise pour assurer des combats à couper le souffle!

Atelier du Loisir qui ont permis au projet de naître en permettant à l’épisode pilote de se tenir sur leurs terres! 

 

Alors, pourquoi ne pas vous joindre à vous comme nos partenaires l'ont déjà fait? :D

 

PARTAGEZ!!

Tout type d'aide que vous êtes prêt à fournir sera apprécié! Nous sommes conscients que certains ne sont pas en mesure de contribuer monétairement, mais pour ceux qui sont en mesure de le faire, à n'importe quel degré, nous vous disons un IMMENSE MERCI!!! 

Sinon, pour ceux qui cherchent comment nous aider autrement, déjà en partageant notre campagne, vous aiderez à faire une superbe différence et à vraiment aider ce projet à voir le jour!

 

Restez à l'affut! Nous vous donnerons plus de nouvelles bientôt! ;) 

 

MERCI!!
story_txt:
(Version française plus bas)
Welcome to the Web-Serie “The Mortals”! ⚔
First of all, let’s introduce ourselves: we are AC Powers, an emerging media team preparing the first season of a dramatic web-series set in a medieval-fantasy context. We are young, passionate and dynamic filmmakers who have been working in the arts for several years now, and we are now embarking on our most daring venture yet!  Synopsis ☠
While we want to keep it as surprising as possible, story-wise, here’s a brief idea of what will the series look like :
As clashes between humans and orcs escalate, Clara joins the Alliance forces to help her nation fend off the tribal forces that are advancing further into their territory. Faced with a reality where magic, orcs, and paladins are real, her training as a militiaman will be put to the test as she discovers a war where good and evil no longer seem so distinct.  We have already produced a pilot to give you an idea of the seriousness of the project: cinematographic quality, beautiful costumes and makeup, original soundtrack, exciting choreography ... While keeping the main plot of the scenario yours to discover once the project is released ;)  Ambitions
Compared to what we see being produced on the Quebec film scene in normal times, this is a rather singular project! Initially, we are planning a free online distribution, while aiming to send the project to festivals (like Fantasia) and to different distribution companies, to potentially succeed in unlocking a budget for a second season. One could say that season 1 itself is like a pilot project! What you contribute...
That's where you come in! A project like this requires a lot of resources and we need help. Fortunately, our dedicated volunteer team believes in the project and is willing to invest in it despite the lack of budget. Also, we are fortunate to already be working with some great partners and have been able to accumulate some resources over time. However, some expenses cannot be avoided... Any money you give us will go directly into the expenses of the production: feeding the crew, making the costumes, providing the make-up, covering the transportation costs... The more you contribute, the more we will be able to offer you a truly EPIC series!   ... What you collect!
The first big reward, for you as well as for us, will be that we will all have in our hands a complete first season of the web-series to entertain us all and make us dream! But of course, this one goes without saying ;)
Then, depending on the nature or weight of your contribution, interesting rewards are planned! 
These can be exclusive content, early access to the season... 
Personalized thanks, a place in the credits...
Exclusive merchandise, even unique items used during the shooting!
We are still talking with our partners to see what other unique options we can offer you! Many more options are on their way!  The challenges
It goes without saying that a project like this has its share of challenges, but we are resourceful! We intend to complete the project no matter what, but the unexpected and lack of resources are always obvious obstacles in projects like this. 
Things may change or deadlines may be pushed back, but in any case, we will work hard to adapt. Our experience on similar projects over the years equips us to handle such obstacles.
And... The higher the waves, the better the story to tell when we get to the harbor!
In the end, the more support we receive from you, the more these unforeseen events can be avoided and the more the project will keep its original nature! Partners
By the way, as we were talking about challenges, we are not alone in this adventure! Several partners, each as devoted as the other, have already shown their interest and are ready to help in their own way to make this dream a reality! In particular... “Calimacil” who equip us with spectacular custom weapons!
"Les Terres de Bélénos", who are lending a hand by allowing the series to be created on their domain!
“Les Forges de Chek”, who provide amazing costumes, armors, and orc scenery!
“Les ateliers du Lys d’Or”, who devote their talents to outfitting our soldiers with handmade costumes!
“Les Forges d'Arcalion”, who is busy arming our soldiers for the battlefield!
Farya Faraji, who composes a completely original musical score and gives the project a unique melodic soul.
Adrenaline Stunts, who lends its expertise to ensure breathtaking battles!
“Atelier du Loisir” who helped the project to be born by allowing the pilot episode to be held on their land!  So, why not join us as our partners have already done? :D SHARE!
Any type of help you are willing to provide will be appreciated! We realize that some may not be able to contribute monetarily, but for those who are able to do so, to whatever degree, we say a HUGE THANK YOU!!! 
Otherwise, for those of you who are looking for ways to help in other ways, already by sharing our campaign, you will be helping tons to make a great difference and really help this project come to life! Stay tuned! We will give you more news soon ;)  THANK YOU!
 
 
Bienvenue à la web-série “Les mortels”! ⚔
Tout d’abord, permettez-moi de nous présenter : nous sommes AC Powers, une équipe émergente qui prépare la première saison d’une web-série dramatique se situant dans un contexte médiéval-fantastique. Nous sommes de jeunes cinéastes passionnés et dynamiques qui œuvrent dans le domaine artistique depuis plusieurs années déjà, et nous amorçons maintenants notre aventure la plus audacieuse à ce jour! 
 
Synopsis ☠

Bien qu’on souhaite garder la surprise le plus possible, côté histoire, la série aura l’air de quoi?Juste pour donner une idée, voici un court aperçu :
Alors que les affrontements se multiplient entre les humains et les orcs, Clara joint les forces de l’Alliance afin d’aider sa nation à repousser les forces tribales qui avancent de plus en plus sur leur territoire. Confrontée à une réalité où magie, orcs et paladins sont bien réels, son entraînement de milicienne sera mis à rude épreuve alors qu’elle découvrira une guerre où le bien et le mal ne semblent plus si distincts. 
 
Nous avons déjà produit un pilote visant à vous donner une idée du sérieux du projet : qualité cinématographique, beauté des costumes et maquillages, trame sonore originale, chorégraphies palpitantes … Tout en gardant l'intrigue principale du scénario à découvrir lors de la sortie du projet! ;) 
 
Ambitions
Si on compare à ce qu’on voit se faire produire sur la scène cinématographique québécoise en temps normal, il s’agit d’un projet assez singulier! Initialement, nous planifions une distribution gratuite en ligne, tout en visant d'envoyer le projet dans des festivals (comme Fantasia) et à différentes boîtes de production, pour potentiellement réussir à débloquer un budget pour une saison 2. On pourrait un peu dire que la saison 1 en soit est comme un projet pilote!
 
Ce que vous contribuez...
Voilà donc là où vous entrez en ligne de compte! Un projet de la sorte nécessite beaucoup de ressources et nous avons besoin d'aide. Heureusement, notre équipe bénévole dévouée croit au projet et est prête à s’investir malgré le manque de budget. Aussi, nous avons déjà la chance de travailler avec de superbes partenaires (que nous vous présenterons bientôt!) et d'avoir pu accumuler certaines ressources avec le temps. Toutefois, certaines dépenses ne peuvent être contournées...
Toute somme que vous nous accorderez ira donc directement dans les dépenses ensentielles à la production : nourrir l'équipe, confectionner les costumes, fournir les maquillages, couvrir les frais de transport... Plus vos contributions seront nombreuses, plus nous serons en mesure de vous offrir une série réellement ÉPIQUE!
 
... Ce que vous récoltez!
La première grosse récompense, autant pour vous que pour nous, sera que nous aurons tous entre nos mains une première saison complète de la web-série pour tous nous divertir et nous faire rêver! Mais naturellement, celle-là va de soit! ;)
Ensuite, selon la nature ou le poids de votre contribution, des récompenses intéressantes sont prévues! 

Celles-ci peuvent être du contenu exclusif, un accès anticipé à la saison... 
Des remerciements personalisés, une place dans le générique... 
De la marchandise exclusive, jusqu'à même des items tout à fait uniques ayant servi lors du tournage!

Nous sommes d'ailleurs encore en train de parler avec nos partenaires, pour voir quelles autres options uniques nous pourrons vous offrir!! Beaucoup plus d'options restent à venir! 
 
Les défis 
Il va sans dire qu'un projet comme celui-ci comporte son lot de défis, mais nous sommes débrouillards! Nous comptons bien réaliser le projet quoi qu'il arrive, mais les imprévus et le manque de ressources restent toujours des obstacles évidents lors de projets comme celui-ci. 
Il se peut que des éléments changent ou encore que des échéances se fassent repousser, mais dans tous les cas, nous travaillerons corps et âme pour nous adapter. Notre expérience sur des projets de même nature depuis des années nous équipe pour savoir affronter de tels obstacles.
Et puis, plus les vagues sont hautes, plus l'histoire est bonne à raconter une fois rendu au port!
Au final, plus votre support sera grand, plus ces imprévus pourront être évités et plus le projet conservera sa nature première!
 
Partenaires
D'ailleurs, comme nous parlions de défis, nous ne sommes pas seuls dans cette aventure! Plusieurs partenaires tous aussi dévoués les uns que les autres ont déjà montré leur intérêt, et sont prêt à mettre la main à la pâte à leur façon pour faire de ce rêve une réalité! Notamment…
Calimacil qui nous équipent d’armes personnalisées tout à fait spectaculaires!
Les Terres de Bélénos qui se prêtent au jeu en permettant à la série de voir le jour sur son domaine!
Les Forges de Chek, qui fournissent des costumes, armures, et décors orcs tout à fait stupéfiants!
Les ateliers du Lys d'or, qui dévouent leurs talents à équiper nos soldats avec des costumes faits à la main!
Les Forges d'Arcalion, qui s’affaire à armurer nos soldats pour le champ de bataille!.
Farya Faraji, qui compose une trame musicale complètement originale et assure au projet une âme mélodique unique.
Adrénaline Cascades qui prête son expertise pour assurer des combats à couper le souffle!
Atelier du Loisir qui ont permis au projet de naître en permettant à l’épisode pilote de se tenir sur leurs terres! 
 
Alors, pourquoi ne pas vous joindre à vous comme nos partenaires l'ont déjà fait? :D
 
PARTAGEZ!!
Tout type d'aide que vous êtes prêt à fournir sera apprécié! Nous sommes conscients que certains ne sont pas en mesure de contribuer monétairement, mais pour ceux qui sont en mesure de le faire, à n'importe quel degré, nous vous disons un IMMENSE MERCI!!! 
Sinon, pour ceux qui cherchent comment nous aider autrement, déjà en partageant notre campagne, vous aiderez à faire une superbe différence et à vraiment aider ce projet à voir le jour!
 
Restez à l'affut! Nous vous donnerons plus de nouvelles bientôt! ;) 
 
MERCI!!

story:
Juarez VR - A Virtual Reality 3D Action Web Series

Two detectives. A sadistic human trafficking Kingpin. No one could be ready for…
STOP! Find a pair of VR goggles. We recommend using headphones for an optimal VR experience. Follow the link and go into the scene. Stay alert and be aware of your surroundings.
WARNING: this video contains explicit language and violence....and we f∆©#ing did it VR 3D!

Go to the YouTube link for the pilot episode, THEN press on with the story when ready:

Go To YouTube and Use VR Goggles for Pilot Episode Here

 

 

WELCOME BACK!

You just witnessed the pilot episode of Juarez VR and YOU SURVIVED! But you have questions. Who is Detective Juarez? Where the heck did that big knife come from? Did anyone break a hip? We can answer all of that and more, but first we need your help.

We are pioneers in the world of  3D VR filmmaking, and we want to bring you in on the action. By placing you right in the middle of the scene, we give you a unique, intense ACTION experience like you’ve never seen before! And we want to continue dropping you straight into the action by bringing you all new, high stakes episodes.


We will dig into the backgrounds of our main characters, develop new ones, and throw in some surprises. Our goal is to bring you a cutting-edge, virtual reality 3D experience.  To keep this adventure going, we need to raise $50,000 to film episode 2 where we develop Juarez's character.


We will be using the funds raised to create more episodes, pay our crew, purchase and/or rent quality 360 degree video and sound equipment, and upgrade post-production technology. We want YOU to see jaw dropping stunts in amazing locations.

We want to scale up production and give you more of everything. We have a team of experienced martial artists and stunt coordinators ready to keep this project going.

Let's create more special-effects, more fight scenes, more flying bullets, more blood splattering, and more ACTION!

To Sponsor our project select your perk below. Also, be sure to follow the action on our Facebook Page and share our project with your
friends:
 

 

Discover the Characters

 
Detective Juarez, a former US Air Force Combat Controller, was discharged after an incident in a forward operating base near Balad Air Base, Iraq that took the life of a USAF Commander, and hundreds of insurgents.  He makes a living seeking retribution. There are few in the world that know his name and have access to his skills.

Nissa is a hand-to-hand combat, fighting machine. Her father, a  PSIA, Second Intelligence 

Department Operative trained Nissa from an early age.  Nissa's skills continued to develop in Venezuela, South America where it was necessary for her to seek justice following a life of activism.
 

Antonio “The Boss” is a man seeking absolute power.  His desires initially led him to run for political office.  He was a known, ruthless, isolationist politician. Antonio eventually realized that hiding his greed behind politics was unnecessary.  The nightclub is just one of his many ventures. He has a hand in every dark corner of the underworld, but his favorite commodity is human trafficking which makes him Juarez’s number one target.

Sophia is a college graduate torn away from her family. Her unexpected disappearance left her powerful parents in shock.  Their daughter was never supposed to be one of those who go missing when they go walk their dog.

Oni is Antonio’s go to torturer and assassin. Oni grew up an orphan, surviving by winning MMA bouts before he turned 9-years old.  He started taking drugs during teenage years to improve his training and chances of winning fights. The fights eventually turned to death matches.  That opened the way for Oni to kill and torture for profit. Antonio believes that when Oni takes his preferred drug cocktail, he gets advice from demons from the spiritual realm.  The cocktail gives him extraordinary focus, memory, and heightened senses.  Oni will track for a week without sleeping, relentlessly chasing his target.  Do NOT fall asleep!

Poppa Skrilla works with Antonio's business side. He’s tech-savvy, adept at using cryptocurrency, foreign bank accounts, and international business licenses.  Skrilla developed what he believes is a successful winning business model that Antonio named HGL: Ho’s, Gun’s, and Liquor.

Thank you for watching!

 

PERKS

 FIGHTER 

$5.  Hey! Let’s just get to the point where the bullets and blood start flying again in VR/3D! We want to make the dream come true.
 

 SNIPER

$10.  You like it from a distance. Take your time. We’ll send you behind the scenes updates. We’ll list you on social media as one of our assets.
 

 TECHNO SOLDIER

$25.  Information first! You stay up to date. You use assets like cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Ripple) to navigate the dark web. We’ll send you a key to unlock the next episode before it’s released to the public. We’ll also list you on social media as an asset.
 

 BODYGUARD

$50.  Thanks for looking out for us. You get Perks 1-4 plus our official Team Juarez T-shirt pictured below. Wear your shirt to show that you’re part of our entourage and ready to kick ass!
 

ASSASSIN

$75. You’ve been trained in the dark arts.  We will send you a poster with a message, signed by a cast member. Previous perks included.
 

 SWAT UPGRADE

$100.  Operators need tools. We’re going to send you a set of VR goggles signed by one of the characters in the episode. This is a STANDALONE perk.
 

 DETECTIVE

$200.  You require a badge. We’ll send you one. We’ll also list you as an ASSOCIATE PRODUCER in the film credits and list you on IMDb. Perks 1-4 are included.
 

 MARTIAL ARTIST

$1000.  We’ll send you a copy of Nissa’s Chuck Sword prop because you need one! We’ll also include you in the conference calls to share exclusive details about the upcoming project. There will be two conference calls subject to schedule.
 

 ENFORCER

$5000.  You’ve been given a particular set of skills. We’ll bring you in as a featured extra. Shooting will take place in San Antonio, Texas. Shooting is subject to scheduling. Travel and accommodations are not included.
 

 FALLEN ANGEL

$6500.  The top of the world is a place you are familiar with. Fallen Angel, we honor you as CO-PRODUCER in the film credits. Make a visit to the set! Set visit date is subject to scheduling. Shooting will take place in San Antonio, Texas. Travel and accommodations are not included.
 

 KINGPIN

$10000.  We name you family. You will be listed as EXECUTIVE PRODUCER in the film credits and profile creation on IMDb. Visit the set up to three times. Set visit dates are subject to scheduling. Travel and accommodations are not included.

story:
Short Summary

Hidden Thorns is a fan production and a labor of love. Our cast and crew is made up entirely of amateurs, united by our love of SiX, the Queens, and feminism. Meet the crew!

  • Hania: Hey, I’m one of the co-creators and writers. I am a massive history nerd and listen to way too many musicals in my spare time.

  • Sam: Salutations, all—I’m one of our writers, and our pseudo-expert on all things YouTube (I run my own channel, La Femme Fictionale).

  • Rachel: Hi! I’m the woman responsible for casting our Queens and making sure this campaign is put together smoothly, with the help of Hania and Sam for the latter. I also write for the show.

What We Need & What You Get

We need $250 USD for editing software costs and $50 USD for props. We also need emergency money if there are any hurdles that arise. All leftover money will be split among our crew to compensate for our hard work. Perks include bonus episodes, your name in the thank you section of our credits, and episodes early.

The Impact

We would never dream of measuring up to SiX, but we know how expensive theatre tickets can be, and how far away productions are for a lot of fans. It’s our hope that we can give our fellow fans something they can enjoy and share with others.

Risks & Challenges

Of course, not receiving enough funds to get the proper editing software and other material/props for the show is our biggest challenge. We still plan on releasing the show regardless of whether or not we meet our goal. As for risks, filming troubles for the cast is one (thankfully, understudies were also cast). Another risk we may come across is copyright claims. The original inspiration for this project was SiX the musical, and though Hidden Thorns is very different, some of our episode titles are inspired by the musical.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Spread the word! Share us on Facebook/Twitter/Instagram and any other social media platform you might have!
  • Watch the series when it comes out!

story:
Short Summary

We had 3 live events canceled  because of the fallout of COVID-19 and the wrestlers lost out on making anything those dates. Because of continued closures of business. We wil be streaming Past events so the fans can continue to watch GALLI Lucha Libre every week.

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise money because whether we run or not. Rent is due on our building plus the wrestlers lose a payday every show we cancel. This is a way to keep can continue to stream and  entertain the fans.

This will help keep us going until we can go back to running live shows.

The Impact

The lost income is a big part of the crew to cover costs on their dailey quest to live their dream.

Risks & Challenges

We will be streaming to contniue with our tradition of always having shows. Our fans are used to seeing our shows every month since June 2007.  The show must go on and we appreciate any help from the fans. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Share and let people know what this means to you as fans and the wrestlers living their dream. You can also support us by visiting and subscribing to our youtube Channel

www.youtube.com/gallilucha

story:
Short Summary 

The lighten ones is the creation of filmmaker bex callaghan taking you into a world where nothing and no one is what they seem. it's dark, mysterious, post apocalyptic, sci-fi LGBT+ drama. this is the story of Eli who escaped from the grasps of a superior race called the lighten ones as they began to take over humanity, she returns one year later looking for answers, what happened to her family? what happened to her brother after he help her escape the city?  only to find a destroyed modern day toronto completely taken over. did humanity loose? stepping back in to the city is a risk but a risk shes willing to take for her family, but what she finds isn't what she was seeking. is she the hunter or the hunted? through this journey you'll see love build, friendships grow, acceptance of the world, fighting for a better tomorrow, but confliction as only Eli knows what she truly is or becoming.  

What We Need & What You Get

we need to raise $20,000 to make and tell the story the way we want to tell it, to really show off the world we want to create. it's no small ask but even a little will go a long way. we want to help our audience through our story, to inspire, to help make a difference. and we promise you we will make the story you'll never forget.

The Impact

There many communities we are aiming to impact with our story to the misfits who don't feel like they belong, to the children who feel different and don't have the words to express their feelings, to the people who don't think they're good enough. we want to spread a message through our show that it is ok to be different, its ok to be yourself because being yourself is enough for this world. we want to inspire people to stand up for what they are, who they are and what they do. with our show and our vision we want our audience to watch and feel a sense of acceptance, love and community that they feel they belong to. we want to help inspire as the audience as inspired us.    

Risks & Challenges

Making any show or movie dose come with risks and challenges but for the LGBT+ community we are ready to face all of them. we believe the LGBT+ community needs help through our stories and voices to make a difference to help each other to have a better tomorrow. the community is constantly battling for their rights, we want to keep fighting for their voices. this is way this show is so important to us, so we can help people be themselves and not be afraid. we are so incredibly passionate about this show, we just want to help make a difference in people's lives through our story.      

Other Ways You Can Help

we understand that not everyone can contribute, so if you can't we just please ask you to spread the word of our show as much as you can on any or all social media sites we are so grateful for any help you can give us.

our social media sites are:

twitter: @ThelightenOnes

facebook: facebook.com/TheLightenOnes

instagram: The Lighten Ones

thank you so much!!!!!

story:
We are currently raising completion funds for our Pilot Episode entitled:

Animal House in Puerto Rico: Barks of Hope Following Hurricane Maria

Leo Roubian, the Executive Director and lead rescuer of Barks of Hope, faced Hurricane Maria on the island of Puerto Rico with the responsibility of caring for more than sixty animals. After the storm took down trees, tore apart fences and wiped out the electricity, Leo found herself facing a mountain of challenges. With no disaster relief in sight, more displaced animals than ever and a shrinking dog food supply, Leo rose to the occasion and demonstrated true heroism.

Join Animal House: Around the World as we travel to Puerto Rico to visit Barks of Hope following Hurricane Maria and celebrate Leo's amazing work! 

__________________

Subsequent episodes of "Animal House: Around the World" (six total for the first season) will take our audiences to Italy, Greece, Germany, Mexico and the US and will feature individuals who are working tirelessly to make a difference for animals in their corner of the world. We will highlight their accomplishments, challenges, triumphs and disappointments. We’ll work alongside them to care for the animals and offer whatever assistance we can. 

Our second screen experience will provide an interactive relationship between viewers, the show, the heroes and our sponsors in the form of behind-the-scenes footage, follow-up stories, feedback, surveys, support and fundraising. A professional production crew and post-production team will be assembled to capture the story and deliver a polished, network-quality show.

Title: “Animal House: Around the World”

Show Type: Animal Hero Profile, Family-Friendly, Inspirational

Tagline: Helping people help animals!

Concept: Highlight community heroes working to make a difference for animals around the world.

The Motivation: There are thousands of non-profit, animal organizations around the world who work tirelessly to feed, house, rehabilitate, protect, conserve and rehome millions of animals each year. The good people that give life to these organizations often struggle in obscurity and many of these heroes dedicate their entire lives and their personal resources to care for the animals. Here at Animal House International, LLC, we recognize that by demonstrating compassion and selflessness, these animal heroes make the world a better place. Our show, “Animal House: Around the World”, will profile these amazing people and take action to support and advance their efforts. The goal is to inspire people to be their best for animals and to create a connection between animal heroes around the world.

The Market: “Animal House: Around the World” will appeal to animal lovers as well as those drawn to family-friendly, inspirational programming.  Furthermore, there will be a vegan-themed thread that runs through each episode and will be heavily supported on the second screen.

The Sponsors / Strategic Partnerships: Animal House International, LLC will present sponsorship opportunities to companies looking to reach a very broad audience and to generate goodwill for their brands. We see a fit for sponsors primarily in, but not limited to, the following categories: a. Pet Products (foods, supplements, miscellaneous product manufacturers) b. Travel (hotel chains, airlines, cruise lines, travel booking sites) c. General Household Products (cleaning products, disinfectants, etc.) d. Vehicles and Building Supplies (tractors, all-terrain vehicles, fencing, tools, fuel) e. Vegan Products (food and beauty supplies) f. Electronics (cameras, computers, security systems, cell phones) g. Service Providers (website development/hosting, phone service) and h. Host-Specific Products (wardrobe, work gear, hotel, makeup, vegan food).

WHO WE ARE:  THE PRODUCTION DUO

Executive Producer: Tracey Kleber

Tracey comes to Animal House International, LLC with 30 years’ experience in both the for-profit and non-profit sectors. She has worked as a fundraiser for higher education at some of the leading universities in the US including the University of Pennsylvania and UCLA and as a fundraiser for environmental conservation with The Nature Conservancy’s Latin America Program. She combines that non-profit experience with 12 years of work in the marketing/advertising industry, spending time with agencies both in the US and UK.

Tracey is an avid animal welfare advocate and volunteer, having given her time and financial support to both local and global animal welfare organizations. She is currently living at her home in Italy with her four rescued dogs, Natalia, Elisabetta, Mario and Luigi and her rescued fish, Fred.

Producer / Director / Host: Rebecca A. Rodriguez

Rebecca is a long-time animal advocate and independent filmmaker based in the Pacific Northwest. She founded the humane society on the island of Guam (Guam Animals In Need) in 1989 and went on to run the animal care department at the largest humane society in the Pacific Northwest. During this period, she developed the EVACSAK, an emergency transportation bag for small animals. Later, she went on to work as a program manager for an animal related foundation where she consulted and mediated for various organizations regarding shelter and program development.

She began her career as a filmmaker in 2000, debuting two short films at the Philadelphia Festival of World Cinema and the Seattle International Film Festival. As a result of positive reviews, both films were optioned and distributed through a short film content provider. To date, she has written, produced and directed a collection of short films, numerous commercials, several music videos and one feature film that is currently being used as an educational tool in domestic violence and child endangerment awareness programs. She received the Best Feature Award at the Reel Women International Film Festival in Los Angeles, 2005 as well as the Best Feature by a Northwest Filmmaker Award from the Far From Hollywood Society in Portland, Oregon.

In 2012, Rodriguez brought her passion for filmmaking and devotion to animal rescue together, to develop inspirational and educational filmed content aimed at making the world a better place for animals. Through her filmed projects, Rodriguez has helped thousands of animals, numerous communities and garnered more than one million views on YouTube.

WHAT TO EXPECT

We are devoted to creating quality, family-friendly entertainment that will help elevate the importance of animals and animal rescue, around the world. Take a peek at the web special we produced surrounding the completion of an animal shelter in rural Washington State. For more videos from Animal House International, visit www.youtube.com/animaltimetv!

"Animal House Blitz Build - a Web Special"

 

THE CURRENT ANIMAL HOUSE COMMUNITY

Facebook: circa 145,000 existing followers

YouTube Channel:  Animal Time TV has 1 million + views of existing video content

HOW FUNDS WILL BE USED

All funds contributed will be used to cover the costs of editing the pilot episode which includes picture edit, sound, music, graphics, titling, etc...we will also use a portion of the funds for marketing and promotion.

Digital perks will be delivered within two weeks of pledging. Goodies and perks related to the completion of the pilot episode will be delivered within a reasonable time, after we reach our funding goal.

story:
Show Summary

What's Moped Money?

Moped Money is a first-of-its-kind competition, where two teams each get one busted moped, $500, and 24 hours to build the fastest, best looking bike they can on a shoestring budget. The winners keep the moped and score some cash. The losers walk home.

Why mopeds?

They're not talked about a whole lot, but they should be. Mopeds are intriguing for a number of reasons.

First off, science: As far as modes of transportation go, mopeds are insanely fuel efficient. And because of their simple design, people who have no mechanical background can very quickly learn the basics of how a motor works. 

If you're not a builder, they're still a sight for sore eyes. These relics are unlike most other vehicles, and are sure to turn heads wherever they pop up. Some people may call them antiques or novelties, but for moped clubs across the US, it's a way of life. 

But if all that's not enough, most first time riders find them exhilirating, and can't shake the smile from their face. So if they were to get one for themselves, they could do so and totally trick it out at a very reasonable price point. 

When you pair the educational aspects with the rich character of the club culture, you've got a subject that is exciting, entertaining, and educational all at the same time. If we're being honest, it's shocking to us that there hasn't been a show quite like this yet.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We're looking to raise the funds so that we can make a second episode of this show. Doing so proves that this concept has traction past the pilot. It also gives us another opportunity to gain enough exposure to potentially get picked up by a network, whether that be on television or as a streaming web series. This episode needs to be able to stand toe-to-toe with any of the other build-off style shows that you might see on TV.  In order to do this the right way, we need to get better cameras, more crew, and new contestants that can be properly compensated.

In short, your contribution to our crowdfunding efforts are essential to making this a reality. However, as much as money plays a part, we're also looking to get a vote of support from the community. If you've got a friend or relative in the entertainment industry that owes you a favor, let them know that putting this show on air would settle your outstanding debts. (Or, you know, just say that it'd be really cool if they could pull a few strings.)

Your contribution will not go unnoticed. No matter how much we raise through this campaign, we're still making another episode. The question is, are you going to help make it better?

Aside from getting a new episode of Moped Money, your pledge will get you one of our Perks seen on this page. Take a look and see what we're offering!
 

Challenges, and Other Ways You Can Help

The biggest challenge we're going to face isn't the actual production of an episode. We've done the pilot so we know exactly what we're up against. 

The real challenge here is finding the right people to present the series to. That said, if you happen to be a major network executive who's just browsing Indiegogo right now, let's talk! Or if you are someone who has experience in the field and would be willing to provide us with some assistance or insight, please get in touch with us.

story:
Overview

Learn with Lee Season 2 needs YOU! Help us reach our next goal. Your support will help us expand production, reach young learners and create more interactive learning tools for creative young minds.

ABOUT Learn with Lee

Hi, my name is Lee. I am an author, kidpreneur and motivational speaker. I make videos about the places I go and things I do so other kids can learn about them too. I wrote a book called Trucks That Help so kids like me can know what trucks do

to help us everyday. On my website, kids can play games and do activities. 

 If you haven't already seen Season 1 you can check it out at LearnWithLee.org. 

 

What is Learn with Lee? Learn with Lee is taking a creative approach to educating and

inspiring the community. Using social media platforms such as Youtube and Facebook we are encouraging constructive online and offline time. With math, reading and physical activities. Each video has a related activity with the goal of enhancing reading, math and comprehension abilities while exploring the community and meeting new people.

 

Before starting season 1, my Dad closed his photography studio to focus on his health. While around the house YouTube kids played non stop all day. We saw lots of kids my age selling toys. We took a homeschool approach to creating a full learning platform that can grow with me and help other kids too.   

WHY WE'RE RAISING FUNDS

We had such an amazing response from our families, friends, friends of friends...so we want to involve you! All donations to this campaign will go toward expanding the production, products, and reaching more kids. It should go without saying that filmmaking is expensive, so we need some help. 

Your donation will go toward:

Production cost and Additional Equipment - The current equipment is getting the job done, age and the continuous use are taking its toll and will need maintenance.

Website, Graphics and Music Licences - Keeping active minds engaged is a large task and requires a lot of resources.   

Marketing - We have to let people know how to find us. 

WHAT IF YOU EXCEED YOUR GOAL?

Our current goal is set to about 50% of the show's total budget. There's so much more that needs to be paid for. If we go over and above our goal your contribution will help secure the following:

Lee’s Salary - I need food and toys! My dad is also making me save for college or investing in other businesses when I get older. 

Community Outreach - Reading my book in daycares and preschools is fun for me and my new friends. Leaving them with coloring pages and awesome giveaways makes it even better.

Vendor Opportunities - I love going to new places to meet new people sometimes they charge to set up. Even if people can’t purchase things I like giving them stickers and handouts.   

Editing - With the amount of time my dad puts into this he probably should get a paycheck too. 

Graphics - Developing the video content, marketing, products, website tools and workbooks require a lot of time and money.

Wardrobe and Props - Telling these stories are so much more fun when I can dress up. You should see when I got to dress up like a fireman. 

A SINCERE THANK YOU 

Asking for a monetary donation is not something easy to do. Thank you for supporting Learn with Lee. Money is great but even watching Season 1 over-and-over again to get our view counts up on youtube will be greatly appreciated. 

 

UNABLE TO CONTRIBUTE AT THIS TIME? 

If you're unable to donate for whatever reason, but still want to help support Learn with Lee, here's a few ways how you can help!

Subscribe, like and share Learn with Lee on all social media platforms.

Watch Learn with Lee videos.

Visit LearnWithLee.org and play the free games, share the free games.

Website, Graphics and Music Licences - Keeping active minds engaged is a large task and requires a lot of resources.   
Marketing - We have to let people know how to find us. 
WHAT IF YOU EXCEED YOUR GOAL?
Our current goal is set to about 50% of the show's total budget. There's so much more that needs to be paid for. If we go over and above our goal your contribution will help secure the following:
Lee’s Salary - I need food and toys! My dad is also making me save for college or investing in other businesses when I get older. 
Community Outreach - Reading my book in daycares and preschools is fun for me and my new friends. Leaving them with coloring pages and awesome giveaways makes it even better.
Vendor Opportunities - I love going to new places to meet new people sometimes they charge to set up. Even if people can’t purchase things I like giving them stickers and handouts.   
Editing - With the amount of time my dad puts into this he probably should get a paycheck too. 
Graphics - Developing the video content, marketing, products, website tools and workbooks require a lot of time and money.
Wardrobe and Props - Telling these stories are so much more fun when I can dress up. You should see when I got to dress up like a fireman. 
A SINCERE THANK YOU 
Asking for a monetary donation is not something easy to do. Thank you for supporting Learn with Lee. Money is great but even watching Season 1 over-and-over again to get our view counts up on youtube will be greatly appreciated.  UNABLE TO CONTRIBUTE AT THIS TIME? 
If you're unable to donate for whatever reason, but still want to help support Learn with Lee, here's a few ways how you can help!
Subscribe, like and share Learn with Lee on all social media platforms.
Watch Learn with Lee videos.
Visit LearnWithLee.org and play the free games, share the free games.

story:
I, John Tuttle, the potential founder and executive producer of The Kings Entertainment, started streaming in late August/September of 2018. Prior to that, I was unemployed and lost my job in an unexpected and rather spectacular manner. This made it difficult for me to find a job back then. So my wife and I prayed about it to get direction from God. We both felt like God was telling me to go into full time streaming/content creation.

During my time as a full time streamer/content creator, I've networked with multiple people (many whom have different expertise that have helped me out) throughout the industry. I've learned the tricks of the trade and what must be done to be successful. I've gained many technical skills in lighting, audio, broadcasting software, image editing, video editing, etc. I am still learning and I'm getting better every day!

I'm now at a critical point in my journey where I have important decisions to make. We prayed to God again about our situation and now I feel lead to start The King's Entertainment (a Christian broadcasting company). We will have a 24/7 stream going on Twitch in the Always On category. This decision represents a big step in my life and I need your help!

Campaign Goal:

Our goal with the campaign is to raise enough money to provide initial funding to start The King's Entertainment, a Christian broadcasting company. This new company will initially stream on Twitch only in the Always On category. Here are a list of reasons why I'm trying to do this:

  1. Reach as many people with the Good News of Jesus Christ (6+ bil gamers/15+ Mil per month on Twitch)
  2. Bring together multiple Christian streamers of different denominations to demonstrate unity in faith
  3. Create a centralized location where 24/7 Christian variety content is being played
  4. Provide a family friendly space where you and your children can watch safe and entertaining content

What Results Look Like:

  1. Saving many lives and winning them for God!
  2. Streamers and churches of multiple points of views (Calvinism, Arminianism, Baptist, Pentecostal, Assembly of God, etc) providing content for the channel
  3. Eliminate the need to hunt down and find Christian streamers due to the creation of this channel
  4. Ability to watch the channel worry free, knowing the content is wholesome

What We Are Offering:

Through this Indiegogo campaign, we are offering opportunities to advertise on our channel, future website, and social media. In exchange for your generous donation, we are offering the following:

  • $100 - Gets your name on a public thank you page
  • $200 - Gets you a verbal shout out on air which will later be uploaded to our Youtube page
  • $500 - Gets your qualifying business's logo on the screen for 14 hours a week for the first month
  • $500 - Gets your church's sermon on twice a week for the first month
  • $750 - Gets your 1:30 or less video on air live to sponsor 2 hours every day (played at a 15 minute interval) for the first month

Where the money will go:

This campaign is set up to cover the following costs: 

  1. My salary
  2. Minimum start up costs
    1. LLC creation
    2. Trademark The King's Entertainment and/or Turtle Bytes Show
  3. Optional Business Enhancing Costs (if we exceed funding goal):
    1. My salary for a 2nd month or more
    2. 2nd computer for redundancy and video editing purposes
    3. Social media paid marketing ads

The risks:

If this campaign is successful, then the minimum costs will be covered. To keep the company operational, I would attempt to raise revenues (money) through the following means:

  1. Reach out to local churches for sponsorship
  2. Subscriptions to the channel
  3. Tips/Donations to the channel
  4. Cheers (Twitch currency) to the channel
  5. Merch purchases through the channel

The main foreseeable risk is revenue generation. The monthly costs to operate this business is going to be a minimum of $4000. If I'm unable to generate another $4000 by the end of February, then I will be faced with the following options:

  1. Attempt to do another round of fundraising to raise $4000 again (first week of March).
  2. If the money raised is between $2000-$4000, then I may be able to continue operations by getting a part time job. If this happens, then the quality of channel may go down. 
  3. If the money raised is less than $2000, then I will have to temporarily or permanently cease business operation and get full time employment

You and I have an opportunity to do something really great. As far as I know, there is no other company like this one we're trying to create. Many lives could be won over for God by this channel. I have a road map on how to make this successful (including budgetary wise). Please pray before you consider giving. I want this to 100% spirit lead and it has to be if it's going to be successful. Your contributions will not go through unless we reach 100%+ funding. Thank you all and God bless you!

story:
Namasté! 

I am AkshĀnanda. Yogi and Founder of The Healing Network™.

I grew up in a healers' house, my mother, Nilu Shakti. When I was 12, my mother was struggling, she was in her late 30s and raising us all by herself. I saw her struggles first hand. Until she discovered spirituality and alternative healing. She became a Reiki Master, and since then I witnessed her helping so many people in our neighborhood, family and friends.
So there was this wonderful healer, having such a huge positive impact on so many people in our first degree, but the world at large didn't even know she existed!

As I grew older, finished my technology engineering and went west (US) to work.

I often thought of my mother's impact, and wondered how many amazing healers were living right next door to the people seeking their help, but didn't know they existed. That help was right next door or in their community, town or city.
They needed to be connected!!

So after, 12 years I decided to give back, by finding a way that seekers could find healers.

We started our journey in 2012, when I built a portal/website to help seekers find healers, teachers and schools, around their location. A Healer Discovery Tool.
This enabled amazing healers to create a profile for themselves, and help seekers in their neighborhoods.

The website quickly turned into a global community of healers.

A year later, I decided to dedicate myself to spreading the word about alternative healing across the world.

We at The Healing Network are committed to healing the world, bringing healing to the masses.

When we moved to the Himalayas in 2014, we started the Himalayan Spirit, our first Healing Center. Here we started meeting some of the amazing healers who were naturally moving thru the Himalayas, and we're blown away by their stories.

We started hosting these wonderful healers, and together with them we hosted various Healing Ceremonies. Not surprisingly, these Ceremonies are powerful occasions, and we soon realised that we didn't have any good pictures or videos of these magical events, to share with the world.

We needed to start sharing this powerful healing energy, and the healers' journeys and their stories with the world.

We needed to find a way to give hope to the billions suffering around the world.

We needed to capture the essence of these stories, and share it with the world.

So, that's what we did. The Universe is kind! The right people quickly came our way and we started to make videos of the Healing Ceremonies and Healer Stories, and sharing them with the world.
We now have a team from around the world dedicated to producing quality video content.

We have decided to turn these life-changing videos into a "Channel of Healing", by bringing the stories of healers and seekers, to the masses, using films and video.

Today, technology enables to do just that with improving bandwidths and cheaper data around the world. 

Video is the way to get these magical stories out to the world.

Our Ultimate Goal is to create a 24hr Channel of Healing Video Content, with Shows, Mini-Series, Documentaries, Reality Shows and more..

Towards this goal we are raising a $110k.
We will use $50k to upgrade our production equipment and infrastructure, and $60k gives us 3 months of production runway.

With your help, we hope to raise $240k which will give us a 1 year runway, to make history and change the world. :)
This will enable us to produce 29 hours of Healing Stories and Shows, every week for a whole year!

Yes, it's cheap! :) We're in the Himalayas, and have a lot of help from highly experienced directors, editors, and production volunteers from all over the world.

If the Universe allows, and we raise $1.6M with you love and support, we will able to produce 24hrs of Healing Content everyday for a whole year.

Some of the shows we'll produce:
Shows:
+ Healing Circle: Where we invite selected healers to heal a quantum mandala, with  seekers.
+ ‎Fireside Chats: Interviews with Healers
+ ‎Good Morning Himalayas: A Breathe of fresh healing energy from the Himalayas
+ ‎Shakti: A show for women by women, about the rising feminine energy.
+ Spirit Gathering: Music and Dance Meditation Live from the Himalayas..

Documentaries / Mini-Series:
+ Healing Journeys: Inspiring Seeker journeys in search of their spirituality.
+ Healing Cooking Show: Healing through food and nutrition
+ Quantum Mandala and the Healing Circle


Join us in changing the world for the better, by getting these inspiring stories out there, especially to those that need to see them the most.

Pledge and Share! 

❤ & light...

story:
Story:

Plain Jane and the Dating Game is a comedic web series about a young socially awkward military veteran woman named, Jane Doe, trying to find Mr. Right during the social media age. Through online dating apps, Jane goes on a series of fun, awkward and sometimes, down right terrible, dates. Finding love has never been so frustratingly fun!

Background:

The number one lesson in filmmaking: Write what you know. So, that's what I did. 

My name is Jazmin Hamilton and I am just as clueless about today's social cues and dating as my character Jane is. I pretty sure that I am not the only one. Growing up in the social media age is a maze in itself. I realized, comically, that when it comes to dating that no one really has any idea what is going on and what the "rules" are. It also shows that while we are searching for love through the internet, maybe we are ignoring what is right in front of us. Every time, I think I've figured it out, I get it all wrong in the worst ways. When I think I got it all wrong, everything seems to go hilariously right and I can't seem to figure it out!

Currently, I am obtaining my Bachelors of Fine Arts degree in Acting at New York Film Academy. I have been in theatre shows, including John Gabriel Borkmann at the with the Road Theatre Company Division. I have written and starred in a short film entitled, 'Josephine" among acting in other projects. Recently, I directed the stage play, "Milk Like Sugar".

Plain Jane and the Dating Game will be the first web series that I have written and starred in. 

Why this Webseries?

It is a completely diverse cast and crew: Only talent, team and hard work matters here.

It is Female AND  Military Veteran led: Being a veteran of the US Army myself, my crew will include military veterans and their dependents who have a love for the industry just like I do. I have had the privilege to serve with some of the most creative spirits throughout the entire Military. More than I have ever thought possible. To be able to have served our country, overseas and at home, and still be able to do what we love (the entertainment industry) is both an extreme honor and a blessing. 

The Impact

My Inspiration:

Instead of waiting for "Hollywood" to offer me a great role or a great story, I decided to create the story and the role myself. "Waiting to be discovered" can take years and a lot of "luck", which may never happen. Well, I like actually doing something for myself and praying that my hard work will work out. This is important to me because I am not waiting for roles to come to me, I am creating them.

My personal inspiration for this story is not just my own experiences but of friends (both male and female) around me that seem to fall prey to the craziest and outlandish dates. But on another not, it touches on the isolation that we may feel while we are trying to find that special someone or even just make a day go "right", with a comical twist. 

Hard work and innovation haven't failed me yet! That's why I need your help.

Your contribution will help me create the Pilot episode of "Plain Jane." The magnitude of being able bring this Series to life is a dream come true. I am creating a series that has the potential to be big but I need your help to get started. 

WHERE WILL THE MONEY GO?

Filmmaking, in general, can be costly for one person alone. Your generous donations will help me pay for cast, crew, location fees, permits, camera rental fees and post production. Aside for Indiegogo 5% campaign fee, all the funds raised will go directly to making Plain Jane the best it can be. 

 

What You Get:

Look to the right side of the screen and see the wonderful perks you can receive for your generous donations! I could not do this without your help. Thank you!

Risks & Challenges

The challenges that would affect this goal, would be not reaching the goal which means that we will not be able to get this web series made and see these beautiful characters on the screen. Whatever you can contribute, will go to the making of the web series. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone can help with money, and that is completely understanderable! That doesn't mean that you can't help! If you can't contribute monetarily, a "share", a "tweet", or any type of share is free and  can help us meet our goal. Get the word out and together we can create a great web series. 

Spread the word: Facebook, Twitter, email, or any other social media! 

Just use the Indiegogo share tools on the side! 

I appreciate and thank you for your time and donations! Lets make a web series!

story:
Short Summary

At the influx of African American actors and filmmakers getting their chances in Hollywood and other media outlets, we are looking to create a dynamic, dramatic web series to captivate a universal audience; shining light on topics that affect many young adults trying to make their way in this thing called life.

My name is Kevin Gardner. I am the writer, director, producer, actor, editor, and cameraman behind the Harlot's Webb project. If that introduction was compelling enough, I have found a tremendous set of experienced and newly-starting actors who saw my script and vision and immediately fell in love with the idea of this project. As a longtime follower of Issa Rae, I decided to stop just enjoying her on television and begin creating and living out my own dream.

As with any large-scale project, funding is needed to hire production, compensated the actors, and efficiently market the project. I am able to do a lot of things, but unfortunately, I am not able to do it all. Any and all contributions will be used to help set things afloat and get my dream project off that ground, with hopes of being picked up by a network in the future.

What We Need & What You Get

Funding will be used specifically for:

- Equipment (lenses, lighting, audio)

- Software

- Additional cameramen

- Production personnel

- Editing personnel

The Impact

There are few African American filmmakers who are truly successful in Hollywood. Since even making it to Hollywood is a challenge on its own, we've decided to attempt to pave our own way to a platform to show our incredibly talent casts' skills to entertain.

Risks & Challenges

We are one of several thousand on-going projects on this platform. Where we stand out is that our executive producer (Kevin Gardner Jr.) is dedicated to the success of this project, using his personal funds for things to come into fruition.

Our cast and crew work day jobs and are not being compensated for this project at this time. 

Other Ways You Can Help

YouTube out channel HarlotsWebbTV and spread the word!

YouTube out channel HarlotsWebbTV and spread the word!

story:
Short Summary

We are The High Campus! THC is a socially conscious cannabis community that educates, informs and emphasizes responsible consumption of cannabis to people in need of medical cannabis. We are a responsible, knowledgeable and mature community of people who understand cannabis, conduct research about it and provide support to our community. 

Online Course:

You can’t pick up a book on growing cannabis and understand it. You need to have a visual learning experience! For the first time ever, you will watch and learn the step by step process of growing cannabis from start to finish. This is an online cannabis indoor growing course for beginners. This online course is broken down into various topics. You will learn everything from the actual growing process, using the best equipment effectively, and how to properly harvest your buds indoors, at the comfort of your own home. This course is intended for entertainment and educational purpose only! We do not suggest or condone anyone to grow cannabis. 

From seed to flower buds

  • Growing process
    • Everything from A-Z
  • Equipment
    • Using the best equipment effectively
  • Harvesting
    • Processing your buds

Plant Science

  • Indica vs. Sativa vs. hybrid
    • Growing different genotypes and phenotypes
  • Lighting
    • Using light effectively
  • Nutrients
    • Using water, soil and various plant supplements

What will you learn?

  • Plant biology
    • Anatomy, gender, and pH levels
  • Indoor vs. outdoor
    • Differences in plant growth
  • Potted vs. hydroponics
    • Differences in the process
  • Grow room environment
    • How to have an optimal room
  • Harvest and storage
    • Room temperature, humidity, and air quality
  • Lighting
    • LED vs. traditional lighting vs. UV lighting

story:
Hi.  Thanks for your support!  Would you like to see more episodes on a regular basis ?  I've been thanked from several individuals that I don't know personally, for making the first two episodes.   My videos have helped other substitute teachers fight for better benefits and pay from their districts.  

        Substitute Teachers are not just glorified babysitters.  We have to deal with many issues in the classrooms and some people do this for a living.   Babysitters watch babies and young children.   Do they deal with similar classroom issues as teachers also?

      We are responsible for continuing the education of children and teens from K - 12, in the absence of their instructors.  That's why we are given lesson plans.  Some districts require that you have a bachelor's degree and pass a state exam to work in their classrooms.  

       Are babysitters required to do that?  Also many of us deal with unruly students and staff members sometimes.   People seem to dismiss what we do.  But if you were to ask the average adult would they do this job, they would say "NO!!!!!! especially  parents.  

       Parents are the least willing to deal with someone else's children when they have their own.  You would think they would be more open to this occupation than others, but they are not.

      So why not treat substitute teachers like the valuable employees that they are.   For some reasons, some people seem to dismiss the details of our struggles and devalue our existence. 

       That's why I like filming these episodes.  It reminds the public of what we have to deal with and why they refuse to do this job themselves.    But somebody has to do it right?  Also, it's great to see our experiences come to life for everyone.   So do you want to keep these episodes going?

       This will be a never ending series because I'm sure many of us have stories to share.  And if you have some true stories to express, I'm open to collaborating with you.  

        If a large profit is raised from any episode that you help create, I can pay you a portion for the information you provided based on the going rate in comparison to the total net profit.  Small profits will be used to pay actors and produce future episodes.   

      I can also pick an actor to play your character if these funds are raised publicly not out of my pockets.   So if you have great material, let me know.

       If I can receive at least $5 from each fan a month,  I can produce a new episode every 3 months. Each episode costs about $2,000 to shoot with an ultra low, low,low budget production company.   I've done this before and our second episode turned out great.

       I can cast you for a small role if you donate $200 or more and If you are an actor who lives or is financial fit to travel to where a future episode will be shot.    Or I can travel to your area to shoot an episode if adequate financial resources have been raised and is available to use there.   So this can be a win, win for many. 

       Interested?  Let me know.  And donate $5 if you like.  The last few episodes were out of my pockets.   And it's becoming increasingly difficult to continue this trend.  I would like to pay reliable actors also. The prior episodes were shot with volunteer actors who are struggling to fulfill their dreams.   So please donate whatever you can.  And spread the word to other substitute teachers. Thanks for your support. Blessings!!!:) :)
